name: Jewel Star: Puzzle Jewelry
description:
Jewel Star is the amazing match 3 puzzle game with many colors diamond.
There are two mode to play:
- Classic mode: Play play and play, kill the boring time.
- Arcade: play with many levels, puzzle.

Always hint. Play with time count down.
No in-app purchase.

Nice art.
Cool sound.
Deluxe Feeling.

Enjoying right now.
